Hi there! I'm building a public app for UI extensions and have two questions:
1. In the development portal, it says that I should modify the `public-app.json` file when I want to add a logo to my app. But I can't seem to find anywhere in the HubSpot docs or online how to do this - does anyone have an idea how to do this?
